Text: Milwaukee Rescue Mission:  The Milwaukee Rescue Mission seeks to meet those in need where they are.

Text: Milwaukee Rescue Mission:  In addition, the shelter offers transformative programs that equip struggling men, women, and children to get off the streets and turn their lives around for good.

Text: Milwaukee Rescue Mission:  And as a non-denominational Christian organization, MRM provides spiritual development and enrichment, all based on the good news of the Gospel; it professes that the Gospel message is the key to lasting change.The Milwaukee Rescue Mission is part of the Association of Gospel Rescue Missions.
